foil.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: metal sheets that are as thin as paper, used for wrapping food
foil.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Cover the chicken with silver foil and bake.
foil.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: paper that is covered with very thin sheets of metal
foil.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a light narrow sword used in fencing
foil.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to prevent something bad that someone is planning to do
foil.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: A massive arms-smuggling plan has been foiled by the CIA.
foil.translation[1].definitions[0].note_: Foil is often used in the passive
